5.1.3 - Overweight or obese population

  • Data
  • Metadata

Europe [persons]

Information about indicator

Name of the indicator 5.1.3 Overweight or obese population
Measure unit persons
Description of the indicator The data shows overweight or obese population by sex during years: 2010 - 2017
Data sources OECD
